Description.Text:
Property Location
You'll be centrally located in Frankfurt with a stay at Mercure Hotel & Residenz Frankfurt Messe, minutes from Messe Frankfurt and Senckenberg Museum. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Goethe University and Frankfurt Trade Fair.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 424 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your room comes with a Select Comfort bed. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a spa tub, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Frankfurt? This hotel has 1453 square feet (135 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-out time is Noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Messe Frankfurt - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Senckenberg Museum - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Goethe University - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Frankfurt Trade Fair - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Messeturm - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Festhalle Frankfurt - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Skyline Plaza - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Palmengarten - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Frankfurt Botanical Garden - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Deutsche Bank Twin Towers - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Europaturm - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Alte Oper - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Maintower - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
English Theatre - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Commerzbank Tower - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi

The preferred airport for Mercure Hotel & Residenz Frankfurt Messe is Frankfurt (FRA-Frankfurt Intl.) - 8.8 km / 5.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Mercure Hotel & Residenz Frankfurt Messe is Frankfurt (FRA-Frankfurt Intl.) - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi.
